Class TurnManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.game.TurnManager

  • public class TurnManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The manager that keeps track of the user's turn

    • Method Detail

      • getUserFromIndex

        public User getUserFromIndex(int turnIndex)
        Returns the user for the provided turn index
        Parameters:
        turnIndex - The user's turn number
        Returns:
        Returns the user corresponding the turn index. If there was no user with that index, then it returns null.
